backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profile management, game catalog CRUD operations with admin/user role-based access control, and blob storage for game images.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two features: increasing GameCard image size (REQ-1) and changing video trailer to click-to-play behavior (REQ-2).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files with implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining color schemes and design tokens for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Dragon Games Store title and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home page and admin panel, wrapped in a layout with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/AboutUs.tsx: Marketing section component displaying Dragon Games Store description, platform availability icons, customer statistics, and value propositions with Lucide icons.
frontend/src/components/AdminGameForm.ts: Dialog form component for adding/editing games with fields for all game properties, image upload with progress tracking, and platform selection using shadcn/ui components.
frontend/src/components/AdminGameList.ts: Admin game management component displaying all games in a grid with edit/delete actions and confirmation dialog for deletions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer component displaying copyright information and a link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Displays a game card with image/video trailer, price, platform badge, description, and action buttons for buying via WhatsApp or admin edit/delete operations.
frontend/src/components/GameCatalog.tsx: Renders a searchable game catalog with horizontal scrollable rows of game cards, displaying loading/error states and filtering games by search query.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the site header with logo, navigation, login/logout button, and conditional admin panel access button based on user role.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Wraps child components with authentication and admin role checks, showing appropriate login or access denied messages when requirements aren't met.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users to enter their name for profile setup, preventing dismissal until completed.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance creation with authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and saving user authentication data including role, admin status, and user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useGames.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on games including fetching all games, filtering by platform/sale status, and add/update/delete mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with AuthClient integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, plus custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Protected admin page component that displays game management interface with add/edit functionality through AdminGameList and AdminGameForm components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page that displays AboutUs and GameCatalog sections, conditionally showing UserProfileSetup dialog for authenticated users without profiles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both standard query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH variables, container settings, animations, and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking existing features for GameCard image sizing and video trailer click behavior, with one pending feature request to combine both changes.
